name: Pump It (Louise Jandot Dit Danjou)
description:
💥💥

Will you be able to team up in order to escape the haunted house as fast as you can ?

  • Alternately smash up the buttons to pump faster on your minecart !
  • You'll face obstacles which will slow you down if you hit them ! Lean together to the right or to the left to avoid chandelier, or scrouch by pumping to avoid spiderweb.

   Local cooperation, two players !  

🎮🎮

Controller highly recommended ! Both players can use the same inputs :

⚰️⚰️ Game Design Marie DUBOIS - Martin COUDRINUX / UR Bastien CRAVIArt Solenn RIPOTEAU - JiyûDev Lucas LACOUTURE - Jacques CLERY-SALENAVESound Design Quentin BEAUMONTProducing Louise JANDOT DIT DANJOU

Game project designed and produced in a week, by students from the CNAM - ENJMIN
